title: Where in options is warded ping?
body: I can't find this command in settings.

replies.body: The recent patch does have a new Enemy ward here ping!  You'll have to bind it in your Hotkeys menu under Communication.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=2dcbTwug,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-19T20:29:38.978+0000)
>
> The recent patch does have a new Enemy ward here ping!  You'll have to bind it in your Hotkeys menu under Communication.

Thank you. The only thing that was bugging me is that it wasn't added in client settings i.e. you have to get into a game before being able to bind this command.
